items.name: ChimneyBluffs Orthomosaic
items.description: Orthomosaic of Chimney Bluffs created from drone images using a structure-from-motion approach. Data collection and processing details at https://www.sciencebase.gov/catalog/item/5b285dfee4b0592076260e4f.  This dataset uses an on-the-fly Web Map Tile Service [titiler](https://developmentseed.org/titiler/)  that reads directly from COG files on Cloud Object Storage.
